settings.product_extended_description: Are you getting enough vital nutrients to stay healthy after Bariatric Surgery? We made it easy to become HEALTHY and THRIVE with our great tasting, raw powder nutrient blend that melts in your mouth and absorbs directly into your blood stream through the glands under your tongue [[SUBLINGUAL]] or add to water for a satisfying drink - NO MORE TABLETS.
settings.product_specs: Be fully transformed like you want, keep your hair, have more energy, stay mentally focused and boost your immune system naturally. Our full spectrum blend of cold processed and raw, pharmaceutical grade nutrients fully absorb into your blood stream easily making you feel great after YOUR Bariatric Surgery .

settings.text:
When Your Nutrients are Limited, Absorption is key!

So you've had bariatric surgery. Great! You've made a positive choice in the right direction. Now, more than ever, it is time to continue that momentum and give yourself every advantage. The most important advantage you need is premium nutrient absorption - particularly vitamin absorption as vitamin deficiency is a major concern for bariatric patients.

This procedure helping you lose weight can also have devastating effects due to your now limited ability to absorb life giving nutrients. Therefore, it is absolutely critical for you to optimize your absorption at all levels.

This is why Sport Formula Multivitamin Powder is your bariatric solution. Our raw powder multi-nutrients are ALIVE! Your body recognizes the real living nutrients and completely absorbs them because they aren’t heat pasteurized – that is, they aren’t dead.

Getting your daily vitamins and essential nutrients doesn’t get any easier than this!

TWO GREAT WAYS TO TAKE YOUR VITAMINS…

Unlike other vitamins, Sport Formula Multivitamin Powder is derived from fresh, raw, cold pressed, U.S. Pharmaceutical grade nutrients for maximum absorption.

Made in the U.S.A. 100% start to finish. We don’t use the cheap heated junk from China like most other products do that never absorb into your body and get totally wasted - not us, no way. If your current vitamins give you an upset stomach, then chances are they are dead and come from dubious sources.

Getting your vitamins in powder form means that the nutrients will be easily absorbed into your bloodstream. No fussing with multiple pills. Simply pour a scoop in your mouth and let it melt and absorb directly into your bloodstream. No water needed. Or add one scoop to 8 oz. of juice or water and enjoy a nutritious AND delicious drink.

MAXIMUM NUTRIENT ABSORPTION…

“Vitamin supplementation in bariatric aftercare is essential to prevent nutrient deficiencies.” That quote was from a 2017 study1 on vitamin supplementation in bariatric patients.

Our vitamins come from raw natural sources and are cold processed. This allows the key nutrients to be absorbed by your cells and allows your metabolism to function at peak performance. Our vitamins are specially formulated based on nutrients that are easily absorbed. We use only the freshest organic raw nutrients so that your body is getting premium quality vitamins and minerals in a powder packed with highly concentrated nutrients.

Our superior formula is not just vitamins. It’s scientifically formulated to provide you with a full spectrum blend of nutrients that are missing in today's foods like trace minerals, essential amino acids, digestive enzymes and so much more. It’s 8 products in one, saving you money.

1Sunil, S., Santiago, V.A., Gougeon, L. et al. Predictors of Vitamin Adherence After Bariatric Surgery. OBES SURG 27, 416–423 (2017).

settings.title: Pro Athlete endorsed

settings.title: WADA COMPLIANT
settings.desc: Sport Formula is World Anti-Doping Agency compliant. All of our products are free from any banned substances across all leagues any levels.

settings.title: energy. strength. recovery
settings.subtitle_1: Radiate with passion and energy using a simple daily dose of Sport Formula and start feeling the results right away.
settings.subtitle_2: Whether you’re a pro athlete or work a 9-5, we all feel better when we have more energy.  For that reason, the Sport Formula line of products is designed to give you energy, strength and recovery.
settings.subtitle_3: Start by taking a daily dose of the powder multivitamin to begin your day.  The result? A healthier version of you.

settings.question: How often should I take it?
settings.answer: Once daily for health, in order to supplement the poor quality of foods available today and complete your body chemistry. However, on the days that you know you are going to exercise, wait to take it just prior to enhance your stamina and strength. Also, the days that you compete, you may take it just before and during an event, for instance; if you are a Triathlete, you would want to take Sport Formula before each leg of the race to enhance carb assimilations and recovery during the race.

settings.question: Are there stimulants in Sport Formula?
settings.answer: NO, there is not. Sport Formula is made up of pure live nutrients like raw fruits and vegetables and nothing else. No additives, preservatives or stimulants. Our products are completely VEGAN and pure of all pollutants found in today’s foods.

settings.question: If I'm not satisfied, can I get my money back?
settings.answer: 100%. We stand by our products, their taste, and their benefits. If you’re unhappy, let us know. We’ll reimburse you and work to fix the problem.

settings.question: Is it safe for everyone?
settings.answer: Yes. All of our products are WADA compliant. The line up has been consumed by Olympic athletes and children alike since 1999.

settings.question: How does my subscription work?
settings.answer: Your subscription is in your control. You can delay, or cancel your order anytime from your account page. We only want to ship what you need.
